extendedInfo.description: Video chat community. Have a fun with thousands people like you!Are you bored, sad or lonely? Are you looking for something new and fresh? Have you already installed some video chat programs like Skype, but you do not have friends with whom you can communicate using them? All your friends are offline or busy? Or do you have a while and looking for a senseless talks or just want to kill time? Then this APP is what you must have! You will not be bored here, you can always find something to do or with whom to talk!  Main goal of this APP is that you may find thousands of new friends thanks to the reach and excellent functionality.For the beginning, you can go to the video chat and have a fun with hundreds of people like you and with the same interests in random chat like chatroulette (group video chat), talk face to face, make dating or flirting or show what youâre seeing with front and rear-facing cameras, share some photos, discuss them and anything else you like. Do you want dating conversation with foreign people, but you speak only your native language? No problem! This APP has an auto translation function which will translate all chat messages from 50 different languages to your native language. So, this video chat APP offers you an easier and faster way to find foreign friends. You'll have a reach choose as this video chat network is already used by millions of active boys and girls from all over the world. When you will find the person you like, you may add him / her to your friend list and make a private chat anytime you like.  When you will get bored of it you may go to the main menu and choose some other amusement like looking for people by certain criteria and make direct conversation with them or send text messages in Instant Messenger (IM) or watching photos and videos people made. But that is not all, in addition you can make and share your own photos, record and instantly share your videos online.Video chat community is the cross-platform worldwide social networking APP that allows you to have fun with your friends or anyone else. All your friends use different devices and this is hard to find an APP which will work at all of them? Well, here is a solution. It doesnât meter if theyâre on an Android smartphones, Tablets, iPhones, iPads, Desktop, Laptop PCs and Mac Computers, this APP will work at any of those devices. Do you have accounts in different social networks and would like to communicate with all your Facebook, Google or VK friends from the same place? There is nothing simpler. Sign into Video chat with your favorite social network Facebook, Google or VK account and have all your contacts in one place. Join the most popular video chat community and meet and chat with new people.Read the rules and notes before download:- This video chat is for 18+ only!- Erotic, sex conversation or showing nudity in the public video chat is strongly prohibited. We are not a chatroulette and have a zero tolerance for rules violators.
